title: Enjoy a 1 BR / 1 BA surrounded by a tranquil natural setting
posting_body: ['IMT Cornerstar Ranch', 'Featured Floorplan: 1-bed / 1-bath / 853 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1670', 'Deposit: Call', 'show contact info', 'Description:', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'IMT Cornerstar Ranch is comprised of one-, two- and three-bedroom apartment homes located in Aurora, CO.', 'Each home includes an array of interior amenities from fully equipped gourmet kitchens and garden tubs to in-home washer/dryers and spacious walk-in closets.', 'Community amenities include a sand volleyball court, a resort-style pool with a lounge and sundeck.', 'IMT Cornerstar Ranch is pet friendly with an elite dog park with an agility course.', "IMT Cornerstar Ranch's prime location is equipped with a variety of restaurant and retail entertainment options with Cornerstar Shopping Center in close proximity.", 'Just outside their doors, residents have direct entry to the Cherry Creek Valley Ecological Park with miles of walking trails and sweeping views of the Rocky Mountain Front Range.', 'IMT Cornerstar Ranch also has convenient access to E-470 freeway giving residents an easy commute to the best that the greater Denver area has to offer.', 'Come home to IMT Cornerstar Ranch.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'Lease Terms: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy: Pets allowed!', 'For one pet, pet fee (non-refundable) is $350 and pet rent is $35 per month.', 'For two pets, pet fee (non-refundable) is $500 and pet rent is $50 per month.', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'Apartment Amenities:', '➢ Built-In Desks & Shelving in Select Homes', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Central Heating & Air Conditioning', '➢ Fully Equipped Kitchen', '➢ In-Home Washer/Dryers', '➢ Pantry', '➢ Plush Carpet in Bedrooms', '➢ Private Patio or Balcony', '➢ Spacious Walk-In Closets', '➢ Breakfast Bar in Select Homes', '➢ Dual Vanity in Select Homes', '➢ Fireplaces in Select Homes', '➢ Garden Tub', '➢ Kitchen Islands in Select Two Bedroom Homes', '➢ Nine-Foot Ceilings', '➢ Private Garages & Select Carports Available', '➢ Spectacular Mountain Views in Select Homes', '➢ Upgraded Black & Stainless Steel Appliances in Select Homes', 'Community Features:', '➢ 24-Hour Package Lockers', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Emergency Maintenance Service', '➢ IMT Active', '➢ IMT CoWork', '➢ On-Site Car Wash', '➢ On-Site Storage Available', '➢ Resort-Style Pool & Spa with Poolside Games Lawn, Lounge & Sundeck', '➢ Two IMT Pets Parks', '➢ Valet Trash', '➢ Adjacent to Cherry Creek Valley Ecological Park with Miles of Trails & Sweeping Views of the Rocky Mountain Front Range', '➢ Convenient Access to E-470, Denver Technological Center, Meridian Business
